t-closeness.description: T-Closeness extends l-diversity by ensuring that the distribution of a sensitive attribute in any equivalence class is within t distance of its distribution in the overall dataset.
t-closeness.use_case: Used to mitigate attribute disclosure by maintaining the distribution of sensitive attributes within equivalence classes.

Quasi-Identifiers.description: Columns used to create equivalence classes.

Sensitive Attribute.description: The attribute that needs to maintain t-closeness.

T.description: The maximum allowed distance between the sensitive attribute distribution in an equivalence class and the overall dataset.
